RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 75. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIGHT FIERCELY was allowed to settle early, rallied on the turn three wide, closed determinedly and drew clear late under firm handling. HITSVILLE raced close up throughout, rallied on the inside and was up for place. ABKER pressed the pace throughout and finished willingly. AURA OF GOLD was away alertly and quickly made the lead, remained clear in mid stretch and weakened late. BELL CURVE raced wide early and was no menace. BAYTOWN BEAVER was no factor. BATTLE OF ISSUS had brief foot, and gave way. PERSIAN GATE was outrun. The stewards posted the inquiry sign but took no action.

ENTRY.NAME: Battle of Issus
ENTRY.COMMENT: had brief foot, and gave way,

ENTRY.COMMENT: was outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 12800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 11. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS OVER THERE WAS well placed on the inside, angled out three wide at the quarter pole, closed determinedly and wore down her rivals. ROMANTIC JEWEL dueled on the lead throughout, held grudgingly and just missed. LILAC LACE was never far back, angled out in the stretch and closed a gap. GOLDEN LASSIE dueled on the lead until mid stretch and weakened late. PROUD MAID MARIAN was bumped at the start and was no threat. READY TO PLAY had good position early and lacked a late response. MIA PROMESSA was outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: was never far back, angled out in the stretch and closed gap,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 12800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 11. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STARSHIP TAXI raced close up early while between horses, angled in stretch to the rail, prevailed, long drive. KHALFANI dueled four wide early, rallied in the stretch three wide, finished willingly and just missed. BEACH FRONT was never far back, rallied,in the stretch four wide and finished well. BIG TRIP dueled early, shook clear on the turn, weakened late. FREE SPEECH allowed to settle, failed to menace. FOREST CHATTER had early speed on the inside and tired. TARTAN THE BULL was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 14100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NIGHT TIME RULER had good position early, rallied down the backside, drew clear on the far turn and widened in the stretch under firm handling. PRETTY LOUD was unhurried early, rallied in the stretch four wide and was up for place. OLD FORTY FIVE had good position on the inside and went evenly late. SILVER MATT hopped at the start, raced three wide early, contended at the quarter pole, then leveled off. MR. COMMISH dueled early and tired on the far turn. LEND AMERICA was no factor. THE COACHMAN set a pressured pace for a half, then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Old Forty Five
ENTRY.COMMENT: had good position on the inside and went evenly late

ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early and tired on the far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio R egistered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOADED ONCE MORE had good position early, rallied in the stretch three wide, closed steadily and was up in the final strides. PRINCESS HALIME dueled on the early lead, shook clear in the stretch, remained clear late and was caught on the wire. WILLYMAR raced mid pack early, rallied four wide and closed willingly. WHOVILLE contended throughout and went evenly late. CASSIE'S RAINBOW dueled on the lead for a half, then weakened. BLACK BUTTE allowed to settle, failed to menace. PRINCESS CONSUELA was unhurried early and was no threat late. BETTABE SWIFT had and awkward start, raced mid pack early, then faded. JILLY FROM JERSEY had brief foot and was through early.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 21500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).). ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SERVE REVENGE COLD had good position early, rallied on the far turn with a quick move and gained a clear lead, remained safe in the stretch drive under firm handling. BIG OHIO raced three wide early, rallied in the stretch and was second best. DEER CREEK ROAD had a good stalking position throughout and went evenly late. STONE COLD CAT saved ground early, swung wide in the stretch and was no threat. SAMMY DA BULL allowed to settle, failed to menace. PLATE IT UP set a moderate pace and gave way.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 36200. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 11 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowa nces).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TO WIN had good position early while four wide, rallied on the far turn and drew close, drew off late under strong handling. WEEKENDER vied for the lead throughout, could not match strides late with the winner but was second best. ELLIOT THE DRAGON set the pace and dueled on the lead, weakened late. MANGA MAN never far back while between horses, had no rally and went evenly. GONE IN A FLASH pressed the pace on the inside and faded. MONSTER HUNTER raced mid pack, saved ground and had no rally. BLUE MONARCH raced wide early and was no menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Elliot the Dragon
ENTRY.COMMENT: set the pace and dueled on the lead, weakened late

ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for the lead throughout, could not match strides late with,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 11 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OHIO PLAYER set the early pace with a clear lead, was headed on the turn, came again in the stretch on the rail and drew clear. HIP HIP HOORAY had good position early, rallied,on the turn and drew even, was outfinished late but held place. GARRETT was allowed to settle early, rallied in the stretch and closed willingly. KINGOFTHEBUCKEYE allowed to settle, failed to menace. MUTINY pressed the early pace, rallied at the quarter pole and gained a slight lead, put in his bid, then flattened out. PATIO PARTY had brief foot on the inside and gave way.
